wikipedia_page.main: William Henry Adams (8 January 1919 – 1 March 1989) was an English professional footballer who played for Hartlepools United, Tottenham Hotspur, Carlisle United, Chelmsford City and Workington.

response: *Billy Adams, banjo player, a former member of Dexys Midnight Runners
